name: Colors (Xander Martinez)
description:
Colors

NOW AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE PLAY STORE.

Colors is a fun, challenging, and exciting brain exercise game that will test how quickly and accurately you can use your knowledge about different colors.
The mechanics of the game are very simple --as the colors switch, you need to identify if every color matches the word spelled out. It’s EASY, right? But is it?"

Download the full game for free on the Google Playstore!
